document.full_text: tunisian foreign minister mouldi kefi said on monday he believed libyan oil minister shokri ghanem was no longer working for the gaddafi regime.
document.title: libya oil minister no longer working for gaddafi
lines_and_colors: tunisian foreign minister mouldi kefi said on monday he believed libyan oil minister shokri ghanem was no longer working for the gaddafi regime.
